transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji madam.
Customer: Good evening sir.
Customer: Good evening.
Executive: Haan ji sir kuch problem to sir bata rahe the aap kal connect nahi kar payi so sorry sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Madam isme jo message lead aati hai na to wo aa nahi rahi hai kam se kam ek hafta ho gaya hame.
Customer: Kya nahi aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: By lead.
Customer: Message lead aati hai na, haan?
Customer: By leads nahi aa rahi hai ya fir inquiries nahi aa rahi hai?
Customer: Inquiries nahi aa rahi hai na madam jab message me inquiries aati hai na.
Customer: Ji ji.
Customer: Lead message aati hai na jo hamare paas wo nahi aa rahe hai by lead to aa rahi hai mai utha raha hu waha se.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Par wo ye hai ki ye nahi aa rahe hai pehle to aate the.
Executive: Main dekh rahi hu sir 29 inquiries aapke paas is mahine me aayi hai.
Customer: Matlab?
Executive: Sir 29 inquiries aapke paas is mahine me aayi hai jo aap baat kar rahe ho na ki messages nahi aa rahe hai 29 aapke paas aayi hai to mere paas data show ho raha hai ki 29 aayi hai aapke paas me.
Customer: Madam monthly kitne aate hai ye to jo maine manufacturer dhunde hai na aadhe se jyada to message lead message aaya tab aaya hai ki mai already stone crusher ki recording me call kar raha tha mai mere ko chahiye tha mai purchase karne ke liye dal raha tha usme to uski lead aa rahi thi wo.
Customer: Haan ji to wahi lead aayi baki to aise koi lead hi nahi aayi hai.
Customer: Wo to maine khud dala hai usme.
Executive: Aapne jo bola na nahi sir lekin jo hamare paas data show hota hai wo real data show hota hai to mai wahi dekh rahi thi ki aapke paas is month me jo inquiries ki jo aapne baat boli na messages nahi aa rahe is mahine me 29 aayi hai sir inquiries.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: To madam isme count to wo bhi ho gayi hamari jab mai stone crusher apni id is wali Garhwal machinery ke id se dekh raha hu to wo bhi count ho jayengi kya usme?
Executive: Aap ye search kar rahe hai ki message pe reply kar rahe hai aap mujhe ye result bata dijiye.
Customer: Maine apne system khol ke ab meri email id already isme hai system me maine yaha pe dhunda stone crusher apne liye thik hai stone crusher maine khud liya hai ek.
Executive: Ek minute ek minute meri baat aap email id pe jaake kyu dekhte hai aapke paas me IndiaMART ke app pe direct lead manager me message karne ka option hai aap usme kyu nahi dekhte?
Customer: Madam message lead me hi dekhta hu mai pehle sabse pehle par hota kya hai ki hame jaise chahiye kisi client ke liye kuch to hame dekhne ke liye quotation hoti hai aur kisi ki bhi to hum match karte hai apni quotation se unki quotation.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: To usme product dekhte hai na to wo product ki inquiry jyada aayi hai IndiaMART me na usi ki to aayi hai mai mera bolne ka matlab nahi samajh rahe ho aap jo mai cheez search kar raha hu uske message aaye hai leads message pe.
Customer: Thik hai?
Executive: Sir ye cheez mai dekh ke hi bata paungi jo aap baat bol rahe ho na matlab aapke paas aapne jo baat exact boli wo ye tha ki mere paas messages nahi aa rahe the pehle aate the yahi bola tha na aapne to maine uska data dikha diya ki aapke paas 29 is month me aaye hai.
Customer: Stone crusher wali.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Weekly me jo mere paas lead message aate hai wo unki baat kar raha hu madam weekly me kitne aate hai mere paas.
Executive: Pehle pehle difference pehle difference samajh lijiye sir by leads alag hai aur inquiry ya usko aap message bhi keh de dono alag hai.
Customer: Achha inquiry ke liye bol raha hu mai.
Executive: Inquiry ka koi amount fix nahi hai koi data fix nahi hai aapko din me paanch inquiry hi aayengi sir kabhi kam jyada wo ho sakta hai.
Customer: Samajh rahe hai aap.
Customer: By lead ke liye to mai aapko bol hi nahi raha hu mai to lead ke liye wo is wali lead ke liye bol raha hu aapko jo aap inquiry bol rahe ho na jisko inquiry ke liye ha ji inquiry ke liye aap bol rahe ho na to wahi to mai bata rahi hu ki sir 29 inquiries mujhe dikh rahi hai mere data me ki aapke paas 29 inquiry aayi hai.
Customer: Samajh pa rahe hai aap?
Customer: Par madam do hafte se nahi aaye ab mai 29 inquiry aapki aayi hongi aayi hongi mere paas thik hai mai mana nahi kar raha hu ki nahi aayi hongi.
Executive: Koi koi koi koi matlab data check karte ek minute sir mai abhi aapko time ho to video meet pe le leti hu aur mai abhi dekh leti hu ki cheeze kaha pe dikkat aa rahi hai kyuki.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Is tarike se aap kuch bologe mai kuch bolungi dono jagah.
Customer: Nahi nahi madam madam jo inquiry ki aap baat kar rahe ho na wo do hafte se aayi nahi hai pichle hafte se band hai.
Executive: Koi issue nahi hai sir mujhe kyuki mere record me to dikh rahi hai to mai check kar leti hu mai abhi video meet ka link share kar rahi hu aapko aap chaho to phone se join kar lo.
Customer: Weekly wali jo hamari hafte wali jo lead hai na unko check karoge sir.
Executive: Sir mai check kya karna hai matlab?
Customer: Mai ye keh raha hu pichle hafte mere paas by lead jo aap bata rahe ho na inquiry wo aayi nahi hai matlab.
Executive: Aapki aawaz aapki aawaz kat rahi hai.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello haan ji haan ji bataye bataye.
Customer: Mai mai keh raha hu jo inquiry hai na madam hafte ki wo inquiry nahi aayi hai mere paas ek bhi ya do hafte ho gaye do hafte se inquiry nahi aayi hai bas.
Customer: By lead to aa rahi hai by lead to mai already use kar raha hu.
Executive: Abhi aapne bola hafte ki by lead nahi aayi hai ab aap bol rahe ho hafte ki inquiry nahi sir koi hafte ki inquiry nahi hoti hai jo inquiries aapka message jo aa rahe hai na wo aapka hi catalog dekh ke agar impress hote hai to wo aapko karte hai usme hamara koi support nahi hai.
Customer: To matlab mai ye dekh sakta hu ki ha kam agar kam ho gaye hai to.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Mai mai matlab jo mera package hai usme matlab per day ki ek mere ko lead milti rahegi baki inquiry aaye na aaye wo hamare catalog ke upar baat hai na ye bol rahe ho aap mere ko.
Executive: Wo aapke catalog ke upar baat nahi hai sir lekin ha agar aapki activity achhi hai aap achhe se use kar rahe ho aur aapka page upar dikhna mile aapko ek cheeze sikhayi thi samjhai thi na sir ki jab aap dikh rahe ho jaha par to agar har jagah upar dikhte ho aap to aapko inquiry apne aap aati hai inquiry aur call dono same cheeze hai aap samajh lo inquiry hogi ya call hogi wo aapki aapka page aapke kisi cheez se impress hoke buyer aapko bhejega.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Jaise mai jaise mai aayi maine google pe search mara aapka ek product mai le leti hu stone crusher machine thik hai mai example le leti hu maine google pe search kiya IndiaMART khola IndiaMART me mujhe dikh gaya upar maine page open kiya mujhe achha laga maine turant usko direct message kar diya maine call karne ki mehnat nahi ki maine message kar diya achha laga to maine call kar liya aapko ye difference hai sir inquiry call se by leads me.
Customer: Samajh pa rahe hai aap?
Executive: Samajh pa rahe hai by lead to aapke upar hai ki buyer ne aaya buyer ne apni requirement IndiaMART pe dal di ki humko ye cheez chahiye ab IndiaMART ka kaam hai ki IndiaMART usko provide kar paye to tab aap wo by lead use karte aapko wo requirement dikh rahi hoti hai ki is buyer ne requirement dali hai ha mai isko use kar leta hu ye sir difference hai inquiry call se by leads me difference hai.
Customer: To iske liye kya bataya tha madam aap mere ko dhyan nahi hai ek bari bataoge ek bari jab.
Executive: Pehle sir aap video meet aap video meet pe aao pehle mai aapka inquiry wala point dekh leti hu jo aapne issue bataya hai fir mai aapko batati hu ki kya karna hai abhi mai aapko link share karti hu thik hai sir aap pehle link join kar lo.
Customer: Karo madam.
Executive: Maine aapko link share kar diya hai.
Customer: Ji.

Executive: Thik hai sir thodi der aap ek aur kaam kariye aap meeting ko bhi end kar dijiye aapke paas ek app hai na to mai app sharing ka bata rahi hu sir aap app install kar lijiye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Message leads are not being received.

- Inquiries have stopped for two weeks.



Resolution:

- Executive informed 29 inquiries received this month.

- Executive explained difference between inquiry and buyleads.

- Executive shared a video meet link to check issue.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will join video meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inquiries, video meet, app
